name: Champion Jockey: G1 Jockey & Gallop Racer
name_original: Champion Jockey: G1 Jockey & Gallop Racer
description:
“Champion Jockey: G1 Jockey & Gallop Racer” depicts the Horse Racing universe through a collection of real world races and immersive and intuitive gameplay to simulate the jockey experience. Players will learn how to use the horse’s reins and whip to ride their thoroughbred to victory. Experience what it feels like to be a Jockey! THE RACE IS YOURS FOR THE TAKING!

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
